extendedInfo.description: Photocut comes with unique 500+ shapes to cut and attach to photos, or used as decoration objects with 150+ background patterns or any color to them. Texts are also supported with a variety of fonts, all 150+ background patterns or any color scheme. Similar as shapes, they can be used to cut and attached to photos, too. A variety of image enhancement techniques are also supported. The effects of applying those enhancements are previewed once a photo is selected.   Shapes and texts can be easily customized to different sizes and styles.You can attach them to your photos so that they transform together with the photos you are editing. With 500+ shapes, 150+ background, free-style colorization, and the capability for shapes and texts to cut each other and anywhere on your photo, the possibility is infinite. You are only limited by your own imaginations! Any photo in your gallery can be imported by a single touch. You could also use the camera to capture a photo and then start editing right away. The photo-loading process is optimized for the best user-experiences. Photos can be placed at any position of the screen with any size. After the photo is placed, it can be easily moved, rotated, zoom in or zoom out. To make it more interesting, you can edit multiple photos at the same time. It is extremely fun to mix contents from multiple photos and hundreds of built-in objects and shapes!To easily change colors and styles for objects and shapes, you can apply any of the built-in 12 brushes with one single touch. All brushes can be customized with any color, alpha channel, style or color gradients in the property option of the menu. Save your final result to your disk with different sizes and scaling method. Or share your photos using any of the services on your device such as e-mail, Picasa, Facebook, Twitter, or any sharing method you prefer. Features* Photo editing with 500+ built-in shapes to cut photos or each other.* 150+ background patterns that could be applied to background or any shape.* Support 40+ image enhancement techniques. * Support text with a variety of fonts, all 150+ background patterns and any color scheme.  * Access your gallery to import your photos* Use camera to take photos and start editing* Edit multiple photos at the same time to create best collage* Easy rotation, crop, cut, resize, zoom or shadow of photos, objects, shapes or everything together* Easy customize built-in object and shapes with any colors, styles, sizes and color gradients.* 12 brushes to quickly apply color, styles and gradients to objects or shapes.   * Save results with different sizes, cropping and scaling methods. * Share your results through e-mail, messages, Picasa, Facebook, Twitter or any sharing method.How-to:* How to save and share photos with better qualityBefore sharing, select background and zoom in with two fingers so that everything is zoomed together. The quality of photo is automatically adjusted to high that way. * How to cut multiple photos with same shapeStack photos together, use 'cut' with selected shape and cut all photos together by moving your finger in the screen.- Caber studio team.

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: Great app with many options.  Wrote Dev about adding in app purchase for .99 to remove ads.  If they can add that will change to 5 stars.  Worth downloading.  Update - Dev wrote me they will be coming out with a pro version after all testing is done.  Most excellent. :-) :-) :-) :-) :-)
reviews.author: Toni Cz

reviews.title: Crashed
reviews.comment: Couldn\'t even open it. Sad. D:
reviews.author: Janeth Rodriguez

reviews.title: Not
reviews.comment: What I was looking for. No way to custom cut.  Only predetermined shapes.  Lame.
reviews.author: John Clark

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Useful. But need enhancements to make it the best.
reviews.author: Sandeep Manish
